mapper.select: SELECT Q.USER_ID, QUESTION_TITLE, QUESTION_CONTENT, QUESTION_LIKE_COUNT, READ_COUNT,DOCTOR_DEPARTMENT_TYPE, U.USER_NAME,Q.QUESTION_ID FROM TBL_QUESTION Q JOIN TBL_USER U ON Q.USER_ID = U.USER_ID ORDER BY READ_COUNT DESC
SELECT A.QUESTION_ID, A.ANSWER_TITLE, A.ANSWER_CONTENT, A.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME FROM TBL_ANSWER A JOIN TBL_QUESTION Q ON A.QUESTION_ID = Q.USER_ID JOIN TBL_USER U ON A.USER_ID = U.USER_ID

SELECT T.USER_ID, T.USER_NAME, T.DOCTOR_INTRODUCTION, T.DOCTOR_DEPARTMENT_TYPE, COUNT(A.ANSWER_CONTENT) AS ANSWER_COUNT FROM (SELECT U.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, D.DOCTOR_INTRODUCTION, D.DOCTOR_DEPARTMENT_TYPE FROM TBL_USER U JOIN TBL_DOCTOR D ON U.USER_ID = D.USER_ID) T JOIN TBL_ANSWER A ON T.USER_ID = A.USER_ID GROUP BY T.USER_ID, T.USER_NAME, T.DOCTOR_INTRODUCTION, T.DOCTOR_DEPARTMENT_TYPE

SELECT H.HOSPITAL_ID, H.HOSPITAL_NAME, H.HOSPITAL_LOCATION, T.USER_NAME, T.DOCTOR_DEPARTMENT_TYPE, T.DOCTOR_INTRODUCTION, T.DOCTOR_VISIT_COUNT FROM (SELECT U.USER_ID, USER_NAME, DOCTOR_DEPARTMENT_TYPE, D.DOCTOR_INTRODUCTION, DOCTOR_VISIT_COUNT, HOSPITAL_ID FROM TBL_USER U JOIN TBL_DOCTOR D ON U.USER_ID = D.USER_ID) T JOIN TBL_HOSPITAL H ON T.HOSPITAL_ID = H.HOSPITAL_ID ORDER BY DOCTOR_VISIT_COUNT DESC
